name: Stability
description: Stability: AI-Driven Asset Management Protocol Stability revolutionises DeFi by complex profitable yield strategies and utilising AI-driven tools to optimise returns for users across Sonic. Through its unique architecture, Stability rapidly deploys automated asset management solutions, offering seamless portfolio optimisation for everyone. Empowered by smart contracts, Stability employs a set of investment strategies that automatically amplify user rewards across diverse liquidity pools, automated market making projects, and other lucrative yield farming avenues within the DeFi ecosystem.
